amendment.description: To reduce unnecessary paperwork burdens on community water systems.

action.text: Amendment SA 2247 proposed by Senator Toomey.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2247, under the order of 6/18/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 41. Record Vote Number: 160.
